content: The financial highlights for the third quarter of 2022 include net sales of $156 million, a net loss of $20 million, EBITDA of $10 million. For the third quarter of 2022, we reported net sales of $156 million and an operating loss of $12 million. Direct operating expenses for the third quarter of 2022 were $109 million, which included $31 million related to the planned turnarounds at Coffeyville and East Dubuque. During the third quarter of 2022, we spent $26 million on capital projects, which was primarily maintenance capital.
